subject: Vam help
description_text:
My VAMs are being odd. I hooked them up, changed a couple settings so it
would vibrate with engine rpms and speed, and feel the lockup on the
brakes. But as soon as I fire up iracing they just vibrate one speed, one
tone, no increase with rpm, no brake shake with lockup. The throttle was
just one note, solid. It wouldn't quit even when I exited the program. I
had to unplug it to make it stop. Now it says power disconnected but its
not. Any ideas??

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4278 中
